name: Sky city
description: My old pixel art from 2019. Then I was very fond of Soviet mosaics and murals, this prompted me to different experiments. I even created a mosaic in the style of that time. Many sketches were in this style, but then I mixed it with pixel art, which I soon became interested in too. Such is the result of a cool mix of techniques. This is the ideal city as I imagined it, where all Soviet art remained untouched.
